name: appchamados-sistema
description: Sistema de Gerenciamento de Chamados para Salas de Aula

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps

author: Rogerio Henrique Berlanda
